response.overview: “Idiot 17” is adapted from the novel “Pregnancy at the age of 17” by Vo Anh Tho. The film is about the hot boy Chan Chan in high school with a romantic relationship with his girlfriend Min Min. However, the two quickly fell into a series of “laughing and crying” events when the girl was pregnant unintended. The film attracted attention with two young faces, the first time touching the cinema lane, Minh Khai and Truc Anh. Sharing about this bold decision, the producer said: “Generally, if every producer chooses a famous actor and attracts the box office for his film, where does the future of the promising actors go? Therefore, I decided to choose these two new actors. These are also two future actors, talented.”
response.title: Ngốc Ơi Tuổi 17
